tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a tooth ache since three months and thought it was just a cavity but than I visited Leo dental and they suggested me to take an opg and I took one it was a whole x-ray and they told me that it was not just cavity they suggested me to undergo root canal treatment.I was shocked and thought it was a long process and needed three four visits because Tats what I heard of 
But than doctors from Leo dental told me it was a single sitting painless method and to my surprise it was a single sitting and it was painless I m so glad I choose Leo dental and dint loose my tooth
reply_text: Glad to help you...

tags: Wait time,
review:
i was suffering from headache and had problem opening my mouth since a month 
I dint really understand the reason 
I had problem opening my mouth so I thought i would visit leo dental and they diagnosed my problem properly and told me i needed to undergo a small surgical procedure in order to remove my wisdom tooth 
This is when I realised diagnoses is a really important step and leo dental did a good job 
The procedure was small and quick they did it without any fuss 
One thing to appreciate is that they managed time perfectly and did a great job 
Thanks docs .
reply_text: Keep visiting us when you are around....it was pleasure meeting your mom ..tc

review: Had the best wisdom tooth removal experience at Leo dental Dental Practice! My wisdom tooth problem bothered me for a few years, but I was pretty scared of the operation. It worsened last month, so I finally decided to remove it. Dr Lahari ** *** **** ******* **** **** *** ** **** *** *** changed my perspective about this procedure! It was not as scary as I thought, and she completed the operation without me realising. The process was super quick and seamless due to her many years of experience. Highly recommend Dr Lahari  and Leo dental team doctor s if you are looking for a wisdom tooth removal.

review: Leo Dental Clinic has been my dentist for several years and I am very happy with the level of service from the staff and the excellent treatment I receive from my dentist whom I trust implicitly.. Dr. Lahari takes care of my teeth with great care and consideration, and gives me sound advice on maintenance in between visits. Having been back only yesterday since my last session, I was very impressed by the high levels of cleanliness and Covid19 safety practice and procedures for both patients and dentist alike. We are thoroughly protected throughout the session and there is huge attention given in detail to the cleaning of the treatment rooms. Also, the prices are always clear in advance so you understand what you are and aren't being charged for. I thoroughly recommend Leo Dental Clinic it gives 5 star service!

review: I visited Leo dental as I had severe toothache from the past one week. I explained my problem with the doctors that is Dr. Feroz and Dr. Lahari here they were very friendly and suggested me with a very good treatment plan to my problem. They said my tooth pain was due to partial eruption of wisdom tooth and it is due to insufficient space in my oral cavity for its complete eruption. They said that I neet to get my tooth extracted. I was initially very scared, but the doctors motivated me to get my treatment done. I  got my tooth extracted and the duration of the treatment was just  five minutes. There is no pain during the treatment process or after the treatment. I was given with prescription and used the medications for 5 days and my problem was solved completely. I'm very much happy for the treatment and the way they treat their patients.
reply_text: Treating apprehensive patients is always a welcoming challenge to us..... keep smiling

review:
I got severe pain in my upper back teeth 1week back 
It got worse at nights particularly while lying.
It subsides when I took pain killer and later pain used to reccur. 
When I visited the clinic, they received me very well. Doctor was very patient and listened to my problem carefully and treated me very well. The treatment was very gentle I did not feel any discomfort.
Overall management was very impressive
reply_text: Glad to help you... take care

review: I accidentally hit in truma my front tooth broken I visited leo dental meet Dr doctor feroz sir explain about my condition and advise extraction replacement of front teeth I am happy with the treatment and replaced my front missing teeth now  I am able to smile happily I recommend leo dental is one of best dental with high standards

review: I had terrible dental anxiety right from childhood because of which I neglected my dental issues and ended up in severe pain. After meeting Dr lahari at leo dental... She analysed the problem completely and provided me counseling for my treatment. I underwent multiple root canals and crown placements which were ultimately painless and I can't be more happier.... All thanks to Dr lahari
reply_text: Hope you had a great and completely painless path to recovery....keep smiling

review: Doctor didn't even check my teeth she just asked me to get an x-ray done and then diagnosed that my wisdom teeth has to removed. When I want to another doctor, I was diagnosed with molar tooth fracture and my wisdom teeth were alright.
reply_text: When you try to consult through phone and expect to receive all the details through the call..the best we can do is to see your x ray....try providing your name and details....so that we can verify and cross check what went wrong ..tc
